Package dao

Interface IExcelDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExcelDAOImpl
    public interface IExcelDAO
    Excel Data Access Object Interface defines the methods for Excel DAO objects to extract data from Excel files and return Java objects. Excel DAO uses different handler to encapsulate string data from excel into Tweet and User object. Since that there is no requirements to modify data in excel, there is only read function to get access to excel files.

    In order to efficiently store data, following data structures are used in this project:

    • PriorityQueue: for its feature that it would automatically sort data as soon as data is added.
    • TreeSet: In addition to its orderliness, it also do not allowed duplicated objects.
    Since:
    2019-03-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Xunjie Liu
    See Also:
    ExcelDAOImpl

      This method is a getter method of IExcelDAO, return a queue of users
      void read​(IEntityDAO tweethandler, IEntityDAO userhandler)
      This method will call methods from POI jar package and utilise them to extract data from excel.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        void read​(IEntityDAO tweethandler,
          IEntityDAO userhandler)
   throws org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException,
          java.io.IOException,
          java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will call methods from POI jar package and utilise them to extract data from excel. read() took two handler objects as input to help it to transform Strings to Tweets and Users.
        Parameters:
        tweethandler - Read string object and return Tweet object
        userhandler - Read string object and return user object
        Throws:
        org.apache.poi.openxml4j.exceptions.InvalidFormatException - If file format is not valid for OPCPackage
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs, which is possible because the construction of the canonical pathname may require filesystem queries
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If specified path name is not valid

      • getAllTweets

        java.util.PriorityQueue<Tweet> getAllTweets()
        This method is a getter method of IExcelDAO, return a queue of tweets
        Returns:
        return a queue with all tweets inside

      • getAllUsers

        java.util.TreeSet<User> getAllUsers()
        This method is a getter method of IExcelDAO, return a queue of users
        Returns:
        return a queue with all users inside
